author: Lesley Waters
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan and add the curry paste. Fry for 2 minutes, then add the white wine and lime juice.  Cook for a further 2 minutes and add the cream, mussels and coriander. Simmer for 5 minutes. Discard any mussels that have not opened. To serve, pour into a warm bowl and garnish with chopped coriander.
